SEO.Titulo: LATAM Hospitals - Evento Virtual de Salud
SEO.PalabrasClave: Evento virtual salud, salud, charlas, conferencias, latinoamerica, medicos, latam hospitals, novedades salud
SEO.Descripcion: Encuentro interdisciplinario de la Salud. Conferencias y MasterTalks de especialistas y grandes empresas del rubro.

Franja.FechaDesktop: This year we renew ourselves with new and more complete proposals. Connect through our social networks at
Franja.FechaMobile: This year we renew ourselves with new and more complete proposals. Connect through our social networks at

QueEsLatam21.TextoA: It is a virtual platform that combines Science and Industry in a cycle of conferences and MasterTalks telling the news of the new normal in the health sector.
QueEsLatam21.TextoB: We unite professionals, scientific institutions, chambers and companies to generate a positive exchange in this context of uncertainty and constant changes.
